Name: のっぺらぼう
About the game: It is a search-type horror game. There are also puzzle-solving elements. 【Story】 In one room of a huge mansion in T town,There was an incident in which several women were kidnapped and detained. The criminal disappeared after one day...It suddenly disappears and I can not understand the footsteps. Afterwards,There was a case where a horror spot enthusiast who had set foot was missing. Certainly something lives in the mansion.Priest protagonist stepped into the mansion to break the curse... 【Operation method】 WASD key：Move Shift key：Run（Physical fitness system） Mouse move：Point of view Mouse scroll：Item selection Right click：Use the item Left click：Action Q key：Item drop Detailed operations can be confirmed in the game. 【VHS Screen settings】 Default is normal screen.but,VHS screen is also introduced. I also recommend it because it's immersive. You can turn it on/off in the title screen settings or pause screen. [About live video and live broadcasting] There is no problem with live video and live broadcasting. However, please do not violate public order and morals. If possible, we would appreciate it if you could indicate the destination (providing site: Steam, providing group: ANFWorks). [Disclaimer] Falsification of in-game copyrighted material, cheating, and extraction of data are prohibited. Please use support emails for in-game bug reports and prohibited activity reports. Please note that we do not accept other items.
